item.title: Compiling Java Native C/C++ Code
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: We have faced multiple issues while compiling a native c/c++ code and using it with JNI in our Java application How to write a JNI program. jni_md.h not found. Incompatible data types. On widows cygwin1.dll is required when running Java code on the native library. and more. Actually we were compiling NLP Solverâ€™s native library (IPOPT) on windows 32 bit and on 64bit linux machine. Solving the chaos! Here are the steps we have followed to solve the above issues:
